AI Generated Template.body:
I am writing to express my interest in the Full Stack Developer position at your esteemed company. With hands-on experience in Microsoft 365, Power Platform, and low-code/no-code tools, I am confident in my ability to drive agile digital transformation and business automation within your IT Strategy & Architecture team.

In my current role as a Senior IT Specialist at Milestone Homes Real Estate, I have led the development of a CRM system integrating geolocation, abnormal behavior detection, and AI assistance, which aligns well with the responsibilities of designing scalable apps and workflows using Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI. Additionally, my experience in building automation and integrations across Microsoft 365 and Azure, as well as guiding junior developers, makes me a strong candidate for this position.

I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my background and skills would be a great fit for your team. Thank you for considering my application.
